item.title: SSL Handshake Failure after upgrading to Cloud Director 10.5
item.author: Danielhanaj
item.description: If you use NSX-T Load Balancer to load balance Cloud Director cell traffic you may see SSL Handshake Failure in Server Pools after upgrade to CD 10.5

item.title: Configure VMware Horizon View Direct-Connection Agent for Linux
item.author: Danielhanaj
item.description: Silently, few days ago VMware has released View Agent Direct-Connection for Linux. In this blog post I will demonstrate how to install and configure VADC agent on Ubuntu Desktop VM.
